alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Franklin (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 11:01AM EST until February 18 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers... Olentangy River near Worthington. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Olentangy River near Worthington. * WHEN...From this morning to late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At stages near 11.0 feet, floodwater nearly surrounds homes along Edgecliff Drive, as well as Plum Tree Drive in Worthington, getting close to cutting off residents. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 4.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.9 feet this evening. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
